page.title: 17THE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The sports centre has been open for 9 years.400 people use it each day.It is open from 5pm to 10.30pm on Monday to Friday_(the facilities are used by{ {Westhoughton High School}during school hours and the swimming pools are used by Westhoughton Primary Schools{in turn}on Wednesdays)_and 9am to 6pm on Saturdays and Sundays.It is open all year except Christmas Day and New Years Day.The general public spends{Â£1,400 per day}at the centre. {The facilities}they offer are sunbeds,badminton,volleyball,5-a-side football,netball,basketball,indoor golf,gymnastics,karate,trampolining, swimming,and tennis.The{most-popular} facility is{swimming}. The sports centre employs 13 staff which includes cleaning staff and pool attendants.
